  • Main
  • Engines
  • GEM RTS

Key Features

Tactical Gameplay with a Limited Squad
Players control a small group of soldiers where every unit matters—losing even one can be critical.
Direct Control System
A unique mechanic allowing players to manually aim and control any unit, including vehicles, for precise combat actions.
Fully Destructible Environments
Every object on the map—from bushes and fences to buildings and vehicles—can serve as cover, and be destroyed to shift the tide of battle.
Targeted Vehicle Damage
Players can aim at weak spots, such as a tank’s tracks, to immobilize enemy units.
Realistic Ballistics
Factors like armor penetration, angle of impact, and ricochets influence combat outcomes.
Vehicle Capture and Repair
Abandoned or damaged vehicles can be fixed and brought back into action.
Inventory System
Ammunition is limited. Players can scavenge weapons, grenades, and ammo from fallen allies and enemies or looted vehicles.
Smart Enemy AI
Enemies react to sound and movement, use cover, coordinate with each other, and set ambushes.
Wide Arsenal
Over 25 types of weapons, including rifles, machine guns, grenades, flamethrowers, and anti-tank gear.
Targeted Vehicle Damage
Players can aim at weak spots, such as a tank’s tracks, to immobilize enemy units.
Realistic Ballistics
Factors like armor penetration, angle of impact, and ricochets influence combat outcomes.
Vehicle Capture and Repair
Abandoned or damaged vehicles can be fixed and brought back into action.
Open Modding Tools
Full access to resources for creating and distributing mods.

Screens

documentation

  • GEM 1
    GEM 1 is a C++-based game engine for developing 3D games, with support for DirectX 9, DirectSound, and DirectMedia. It features a modular architecture, built-in development tools, and a modding system.
    SDK link
  • GEM 2
    GEM provides a robust out-of-the-box platform for studios aiming to develop complex strategy games efficiently. Its accessible toolset and modular architecture enable quick iteration cycles without compromising on gameplay depth or scalability.
    SDK link
  • GEM 3
    GEM offers studios a turnkey solution for rapid, cost-effective development of strategy games, combining rich gameplay depth with streamlined, accessible tools—ideal for accelerating time-to-market and maximizing ROI.
    SDK link
  • GEM RTS
    GEM is a purpose-built game engine designed for developing 3D real-time strategy games, offering robust support for both single-player and multiplayer experiences.
    Its standout feature is a streamlined, intuitive development workflow that empowers both small indie teams and large-scale studios to bring their visions to life efficiently.
    SDK link
